Sherif Salama Hasan (a mụrụ na 12 Julaị 1979 na Cairo) bụ onye Egypt na-eme ihe nkiri
Ọ rụrụ ọtụtụ ihe nkiri na usoro TV.
A mụrụ ya n'ezinụlọ a ma ama na-etinye aka na nka
Nna ya Salama Hasan bụ onye nduzi ihe nkiri, nwanne ya nwanyị nke okenye Manal Salama bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri
Ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ ya na Higher institute of theatrical arts ma mesịa malite ọrụ dịka onye na-ese foto
Ọrụ mbụ ya n'ime ihe nkiri bụ na A woman from time of love TV series n'afọ 1998

Ọrụ ya a kachasị mara bụ na Morgan ahmed morgan n'afọ 2007 ya na Adel Emam na Basma, Spies war n'afọ 2009 ya na Menna Shalabi na Bassem Yakhour, Thieves trap n'afọ 2009, The door in the door n'afọ 2011, Napoleon na mahroosa n'afọ 2012 ya na Laila Elwi, mmehie na 2014 ya na Shery Adel, Misunderstanding n'afọ  2015 ya na Cyrine Abdelnour, The black box na 2020 ya na Mona Zaki, Light Shefa Hai, ha lụrụ ụmụ abụọ, Shefa na 2020 ha nwere ụmụ.
